name: OpenWeatherMap
description: Access current weather data, forecasts, and historical data for any location

about.overview: OpenWeatherMap provides a comprehensive set of weather APIs that deliver current weather data, forecasts, historical data, and weather maps for any location worldwide. The service collects and processes data from multiple sources including meteorological broadcast services, raw data from airport weather stations, radar data, and more.
features: Current weather data for any location
Weather maps and layers for visualization
useCases: Adding weather information to travel and navigation apps

endpoints.description: Returns current weather data for a specific location
Provides 5-day weather forecast with data every 3 hours
Returns current, minute forecast, hourly forecast and daily forecast data

quickStart: Sign up for a free account at https://home.openweathermap.org/users/sign_up
Get your API key from the API keys tab in your account dashboard
Make your first API request using your key as the appid parameter

authentication.description: Include your API key as the appid query parameter in each request
